headline: Corning Collaborates with Broadcom To Accelerate AI Data Center Processing Capacity
summary: CORNING, N.Y., May 13, 2025--Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW), a world leader in glass science and optical physics, today announced a collaboration with Broadcom Incorporated (NASDAQ:AVGO), a leading supplier in the semiconductor field, on a co-packaged optics (CPO) infrastructure that will significantly increase processing capacity within data centers.

headline: Exploring High Growth US Tech Stocks for May 2025
summary: Over the last 7 days, the United States market has risen 3.9% and over the past 12 months, it is up 12%, with earnings forecasted to grow by 14% annually. In this environment, identifying high growth tech stocks involves looking for companies that demonstrate strong innovation, scalability, and adaptability to capitalize on these positive market trends.

headline: GLW Q1 Earnings Call: Corning Highlights Optical and Solar Growth, Addresses Tariff Resilience
summary: Glass and electronic component manufacturer Corning (NYSE:GLW) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 16% year on year to $3.45 billion. On the other hand, next quarter’s outlook exceeded expectations with revenue guided to $3.85 billion at the midpoint, or 3.5% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.54 per share was 5.3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
